subject: Baseball
Tucson Shooting (2011)
Books and Literature
lead_paragraph: The former manager Dallas Green has written a book that includes a chapter on his 9-year-old granddaughter who was killed in the 2011 shooting that left Gabrielle Giffords injured.
snippet: The former manager Dallas Green has written a book that includes a chapter on his 9-year-old granddaughter who was killed in the 2011 shooting that left Gabrielle Giffords injured.
